title: REDUCED: 1909 Lancaster Red Roses Team PC w/ Stan Coveleski (HOF)
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: REDUCED: 1909 Lancaster Red Roses Team PC w/ Stan Coveleski (HOF)
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is the following 1909 Lancaster Red Roses Team PC featuring Stan Coveleski (bottom left), which pre-dates his 1915 Zeenut and 1920 W520/W522 "rookies" by a huge margin.  The postcard was postally used/canceled on October 16, 1909.  The front is immaculate.

Looking to get [STRIKE]$475[/STRIKE] $400 net to me.  Shipping is on me.  PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.

Compare my price to this one ($649) from 2013 and you'll see that I've priced this pretty competitively:

[url]https://loveofthegameauctions.com/Lo...ventoryid=1607[/url]

...or this one ($554) from 2018 - still a great deal:

[url]https://loveofthegameauctions.com/Lo...entoryid=15265[/url]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1909%20Coveleski.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1909%20Coveleski%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]
